title: On losing half of my NFTs and surviving the worst day of my life (so far...)
body:
Yesterday was the worst day of my life. I lost four ultra-rare NFTs in a blip. All of a sudden, my heart and brain felt like they didn't belong to the same person. My hands were shaking. I cried and dried my eyes only to wet them again. On the plane home, the nice Jetblue lady asked me if I was okay and gave me a cup of water. I didn't know what or how to respond. I don't even remember her name. All I remember was replaying the scenario over and over again in my head, fantasizing about rewinding time, if only for 9 seconds. Eventually, I realized that stands aren't real and settled for the next best thing: sublimating all of my destructive emotions into an essay as they flashed through me. I hope the sharp blade of my pen and the red ink on my paper will serve as a gaping reminder of the perils of greed and allow me to heal and become a better person.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/vCmC9yhYql_TpCmXT817I.jpeg?height=2048&width=947)

This morning, the scammer sold my BAYC #7954 for 74.2ETH on LooksRare. I've had my Prussian helmet ape since early last summer. I had just finished my econ final and was locked and loaded after flipping one of my mystic Axies. I remember staying up all night scurrying through the jungle, trying to snipe something off the floor. After chugging a Red Bull, I narrowed it down to my two favorite traits: the Prussian helmet for 3 ETH and the commie hat for 4. Then I pulled the trigger. I have held him through every boom and bust cycle from then to now. So many nights I have resisted the temptation to paperhand him, only to lose him to a carefully contrived scam.

I've had my Bob Ross cool cat the day the project launched on July 1st. It was on a hot midsummer day in Beijing, and I sat down in the lobby of the Puxuan hotel. I was refreshing OpenSea like crazy, and my VPN was bugging out. I finally found someone who got lucky with a Bob Ross TV head cool cat and decided to sell it for 2 ETH. I bought three cats that day and flipped one for profit, and I've held onto the other two till now, until yesterday. I still remember vividly the day someone offered me 100ETH for it (coincidentally, it happened to be the day I broke up with my ex).

The cat doodle was my favorite. I traded 60 ETH plus a rainbow head with 60s glasses and a popsicle to get it. It was a 1/1 custom doodle hand-drawn by Burnt toast himself. I've had it set as my profile pic ever since. When I launched her into space and saw her meow in her spaceship, I developed a deeply emotional, uniquely-mine-ownership connection with my NFT. I came to understand her as more than just a piece of art or a vehicle for parking ether. This was something I've never felt before degen-ing into liquidity pools: I've reconstructed my entire digital identity around her, and I was ready to never sell. My cat was genuinely something I thought I could pass on to my kids when they outgrew going to Doodleland on the weekend. Yesterday I entered the doodles holder discord channel asking for help. That was the first time I saw someone use the cat doodle emote. I had never used it before myself, and I decided to try it out then. It broke my heart. A lot has changed since I got my first BTC in 2017, and every single one of these NFTs has been an integral part of my journey.

Ultra rare NFTs from blue-chip collections are extremely illiquid. It is common practice for traders like me to source liquidity ad hoc by approaching strangers to do OTC deals. Trades involving a complex combination of NFTs from multiple collections and fungible tokens are not rare. Yet, this method of trading is inherently very risky. It's the Wild West out here, and there are no sheriffs. It was my decision and my decision alone to shoulder these risks, and as I got comfortable with doing them on a daily basis, I became complacent. When I became complacent, I let my guard down. When I let my guard down, I was ruined. There are many awesome people in the community, and doing crazy deals with them has been one of the best parts of my NFT journey. Yet, the more my faith and conviction in NFTs grew, the less careful I became.

I want to remind everyone that scammers will always be smarter than you. By profession, they spend all their time coming up with the best new way to scam. They innovate and iterate their product faster than most overhyped NFT metaverse brands. They work in teams to orchestrate elaborate schemes to get you when you least expect it. Unlike the days when people phished you by emailing google forms or sent you fake links to NFTTrader, [Swapstr.io](http://Swapstr.io) was made of sterner stuff: a team of experts who maintained a rigid corporate hierarchy. Even when I tracked down the erc20 address of the crony who scammed me and found that he bilaterally linked it to his own KYC'd Coinbase, he admitted to me under duress that he only took a small percentage cut and that he had transferred control of the precious NFTs to the "CEO."

The website they put up had a fully functional UI that held up to scrutiny. It didn't use generated links. It was a cleaner user experience than both NFTTrader and Sudoswap, to be honest. They set up a fake medium FAQ with 8.8k likes, a fake Twitter profile with 12k followers (Sudoswap only has 13k), and a fake discord with a fake sales bot that churned out fake trades every five seconds. They will stop at nothing. Sure, red flags were screaming at me from every corner, but I was too eager to get the deal done. I had already begun fantasizing about all the new NFTs I could buy. Once I started rationalizing my feelings of doubt, I sealed my fate. When I justified "testing the site out" to myself, I dug my grave.

As of writing, the scammer has sold everything besides the cool cat and mixed the ETH through tornado cash. I filed a report with the local police, but I strongly doubt that they or the department of homeland security will be able to do anything to this highly organized cybercrime syndicate probably based in Saint Kitts and Nevis. I feared shame and disgrace more than anything in the world, and by falling for this scheme and sharing my story, I have utterly destroyed myself. They say that the wise man learns from the mistakes of others: may I at least learn from my own.

Brace yourselves, doods—we have a long and rocky road ahead of us. Yet, the end of the tunnel looks brighter than ever. Crypto has gulped down the world sector by sector, and culture itself is next. I love this space more than anything and am ready to dedicate my life to it. Still, I think the future of NFTs and crypto will not be anonymous. Crypto will not be a vigilante veiled in shadow. Crypto is not about the Silk Road, the dark web, or night-watchman libertarianism. Crypto is about self-ownership, self-expression, democratization, securitization, and the new counter-cultural revolution. It is about openness, composability, interoperability, and the metaverse (whatever that means). Crypto is about the community of young and brilliant college dropouts who are discontent with how things are and want to build something better—something batshit crazy. It's about the Mfers, the covens, and the beans. I want to be a part of this, whatever it is.

Reality will not alter itself according to my ability to stomach it. I will bite my teeth and stare down life, red in tooth and claw. I will get through today as I have gotten through yesterday, and I will get through tomorrow unbroken, knowing that I will emerge a stronger, better version of myself. My mindset has changed. I will never fall for this again. Through rainbow-puking my thoughts down right now, I’ve come to the realization that the network, experience, and friends I have acquired along the way are far more valuable than the 400 ETH or a million dollars that I have lost: funny that it took a club to the head before I saw the stars. In the end, I just want to say that the space is big. Really big. You just won’t believe how vastly, hugely, mindbogglingly big it is. I want everyone out here to know that we are all way ahead of the curve, and there will always be more exciting opportunities ahead. There will always be more pie, and we love pie. And boba. WAGMI.

Amor Fati,

Boba Epicure

12 March 2022

[My Twitter](https://twitter.com/bobaepicure)

O tempo que você planeja desperdiçar não é um desperdício de tempo (Marthe Troly-Curtin).

Quando é você quem planejou ficar à toa, ver uma série, não fazer nada… significa que quem está no comando é você.

Esse planejamento também é uma forma de produtividade, considerando obviamente que as tarefas de produção estão cumpridas.

Ou você comanda o seu dia ou o seu dia comanda você (Jim Rohn).

Quem não tem programação, quem não tem agenda, se torna a agenda dos outros, trabalha na urgência, não é produtivo e perde muito na qualidade de vida.

title: 无清算借贷 VendorFinance
body:
部分抵押，无抵押，借贷，清算……

最近 CT 到处都是这些让人紧张的气氛，今天来点正能量的吧！

无清算借贷来一个要不要？

* 当然抵押品还是需要的，正常情况下仍是超额抵押；
* 利息还是要支付的，但利率是固定的；
* 借款是有期限的，但只要借款人同意，是可以延期的 (rollover)

这就是 VendorFi 提供的服务 (即将上线 Arbitrum)，你可能会好奇，那如果抵押品下跌的过多，到期的时候我的债务比抵押品还值钱，那我可以选择不还钱了？

答案是 YES，你带走债务，lender 拿走你的抵押品，完美！？

你肯定会觉得挺完美的，而且偷笑 lender 是个大傻子，但或许这也正是 lender 想要的呢？！

我们换个场景，就说再当前的熊市，你持有 USDC 计划买入 ETH，目标价格为 $900，你可以通过在 VendorFi 上建立一个 (无需许可) 借贷市场来实现：

* 抵押品 ETH
* 借出资产 USDC
* Mint Ratio (1/ 抵押率) 设置为 83% (900/1085.19)
* 再根据你的情况设置到期时间 Expiry 和利率 Term Rate

![截图来自 https://vendor.finance/create-pool](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/cIFKkXHgTO3NsduBcb5Jm.png?height=518&width=509)

到期时会有 4 个场景：

* ETH > $900，borrower 按时还债，你将得到更多的 USDC (利息)；
* ETH > $900，borrower 未还款，你以 $900 的价格买到了市价高于 $900 的 ETH；
* ETH < $900，borrower 按时还债，你得到更多的 USDC (利息)，而且还能买到更便宜的 ETH；
* ETH < $900，borrower 未还款，你你以 $900 的价格买到了 ETH，这正是你的目标价格嘛

不知你对这个方案是否满意？而这个角色就是刚才可能被你嘲笑的大傻 lender。

其实上述的方式，对 DAO 特别的适用，让 DAO 的小金库转/赚起来：

* 为自家的 Token 设置一个借贷市场；
* 赚取利息的同时，还在被动的 buy back；
* Token 的持有者多/有了个抵押 Token 借款的地方 (而且无清算风险)，提高了资金的使用效率

VendorFi 的这套机制最让我兴奋的是，因为没有清算，所有市场没有卖压，极大地释放了尤其在极端行情下 DeFi 借贷协议的运行压力！

当然，任何协议都不可能是完美的：

* 在上述 “$900 买入 ETH” 的举例中，如果 $900 发生在借贷过程中，那你可能就失去了 buy the dip 的机会；

注意事项：

* 借贷池设置好之后，抵押率是不能更改的！ 但你可以根据情况调整借款利率，不过调整后的参数仅对之后的借款人有效；
* 你还可以停止借款 (pause borrowing)，同样的这个操作对之前的借款人不会有任何影响

title: NFT Monthly Report — June 2022 - Flagship DeFi - Medium
body:
*This month’s trends, stats, and developments within the NFT market.*

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*XO29ZeazIcL04jJr_h6xkA.jpeg)

## **Introduction**

It’s been a rough month for the NFT market, and many believe we might be close to reaching the bottom. We continue to see a significant decrease in trading activity. Despite the high fear in the market, we saw exciting projects launch, and multiple events occurred in June. Here at [Flagship](https://flagshipdefi.com/), we love to bring you the\* best of the best\* when it comes to NFT insights! Here are our favorite stories, trends, and market statistics from the last 30 days.

## Top News This Month

* On July 16, Yuga Labs will launch the first demo of their metaverse, *The Otherside*. We have seen the price of virtual lands appreciating since the public [announcement](https://twitter.com/OthersideMeta/status/1544023315160993793?s=20&t=aTNoSkNtHGNzK2MJGolVYQ) via Twitter.
* OpenSea announces its first-ever NFT collection named [Zoonies](https://twitter.com/ZooniesXYZ?s=20&t=2j3Na8q7SEIc0VCF-wTeKA), which will be launched explicitly with their launchpad. More details to come in the upcoming weeks.
* New crypto phones are coming out in the near future. We saw the announcement of the Solana [smartphone](https://solana.com/news/saga-reveal), which pumped the price of Solana from $26 to $40 earlier last month. Additionally, HTC announced their partnership with Polygon to create the [HTC Desire 22](https://www.htc.com/eu/smartphones/htc-desire-22-pro/) smartphone, which will include a built-in digital crypto wallet, NFT support, and additional virtual reality applications, which could potentially become helpful for metaverse experiences.
* OpenSea co-founder, [Alex Atallah](https://twitter.com/xanderatallah?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor) steps down from the company but will remain on the company’s board. Additionally, OpenSea experienced a major email data breach and [warned](https://twitter.com/opensea/status/1542338816551243776?s=20&t=aTNoSkNtHGNzK2MJGolVYQ) all users of phishing scams. One of their employees shared email addresses and newsletter subscriber lists with external parties. It is estimated that 1.8 million users were affected.
* [SoRare](https://sorare.com/) officially signed the top football player [Kylian Mbappé](https://twitter.com/kmbappe) as a brand ambassador. On a similar note, Binance [announced](https://twitter.com/binance/status/1539969367726620674?s=20&t=wAHGLeBVRRxO_m7wVeYymw) it’s a partnership with Cristiano Ronaldo for the release of an upcoming NFT project.
* Facebook, a.k.a. Meta, will begin testing NFT integration in their platform this week with selected creators, available only in the United States as an initial phase. Zuckerberg announced earlier this year that he plans to make Instagram into an NFT Marketplace.
* Fox Entertainment is investing $100 Million for an NFT animated series designed by the creator of the famous Rick & Morty series.
* [Illuvium](https://www.illuvium.io/) teases by releasing gameplay [footage](https://twitter.com/illuviumio/status/1544324249581588480?s=20&t=YoMNrPA9b9As8JzrJWTH1Q) of its highly anticipated game *Overworld*.
* [Nansen](https://www.nansen.ai/), one of the most popular tools used to analyze crypto markets, announced their new feature to track Solana NFT collections, providing valuable insights and key metrics to keep track of the top collections.
* [NFT.NYC](http://www.nft.nyc/) took place this month. An annual event where NFT communities and brands gather in Manhattan where many interesting events occur, such as social networking and promotional events.[ Ape Fest](https://apefest.com/) was one of the week's highlights where Eminem and Snoop Dogg premiered a new song. Here is a [list](https://nftnow.com/guides/2022-nft-nyc-field-guide/) of the events that happened during that week.
* WeChat, the popular social media Chinese platform, will ban accounts related to “virtual currency or digital collection business”.
* EU negotiators met last week to discuss rules and regulations related to crypto, digital assets, and NFTs. It is possible that soon, NFT creators would need to be “a\* legal person rather than a decentralized entity”\*. They might be required to inform the authorities and comply with specific legal measures.

## Market Statistics — Last 30 Days

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*ND2MLeeoYY3WQ0RtWOkNQw.png)

Top Ethereum collections: Yuga Labs takes three top five positions in the chart. *Otherdeed* is holding up strong as we approach the upcoming release of their gameplay demo happening on July 16. In the last two weeks, we saw a strong performance by Moonbirds, with a floor price increased from 16 ETH to 30 ETH in the previous two weeks of June. *[See full stats](https://coinmarketcap.com/nft/)*.

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*OKypo4-kqPWOJiamwbsHDQ.png)

Top 10 NFTs on Ethereum based on 30d volume. [CoinMarketCap](https://coinmarketcap.com/nft/)

Now let’s look at the Top 10 NFT collections in Solana. DeGods remains at the top of the chart, followed by Shadowy Super Coder. Degen Ape Academy has remained steady during the whole month. Below are the 30-day statistics of the top collections, ranked by total floor value.

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*AYNPSViVApVbbJSPlk3jwA.png)

\*Top 10 NFTs on Solana ranked by Total Floor Value. \**[SolanaFloor](https://solanafloor.com/)*

The popularity of NFTs has significantly decreased over the last few months. The term *NFT* has declined in Google search volume. People are showing less interest in researching topics related to NFTs, and it seems like the hype has cool down in just a couple of months.

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*GIoZxGwm95PWCytqedmVqw.png)

Google Trends search activity for ‘NFT’ in the last 12 months.

The downtrend is also seen in the daily trading volume chart for NFTs in the Ethereum blockchain. We continue to see a downward trend since the start of the year. As of July 1, the trading volume of NFTs in the Ethereum blockchain is very low, closing the month at $21M. That’s -65% less volume than last month’s $61M. *[Full stats here.](https://dune.com/hildobby/NFTs)*

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*ULe_qkDYHnUujiTazHyAHg.png)

USD volume on Ethereum NFTs since the start of the year. Source: [Dune](https://dune.com/hildobby/NFTs)

**Here are some projects you should keep an eye on:**

* [Doodles](https://doodles.app/) released 24,000 [Genesis boxes](https://opensea.io/collection/genesis-box), a box of genesis edition wearables for the upcoming Doodles 2 collection. Their first collection's current floor price is 13.8 ETH on [OpenSea](https://opensea.io/collection/doodles-official) marketplace. An exciting project to watch in the upcoming months.
* [The Otherside](https://otherside.xyz/): the metaverse of the BAYC will be launching its first public version of their metaverse. A small number of selected users will have the opportunity to play. We are hoping to see some exciting gameplay content soon.
* Duppies: the number one project in Solana, DeGods, plans to release the new NFT collection [Duppies](https://www.duppies.com/) on July 15.
* Generative art sales have soared over the past few weeks. Generative art is created on computers using code to generate visual outputs on a canvas, which can be tokenized and stored on the blockchain as NFTs. We have seen significant volume in projects like [Anticyclone](https://www.artblocks.io/project/304), which has gone from 0.75 ETH to 5.4 ETH in just a few months on [OpenSea](https://opensea.io/collection/anticyclone-by-william-mapan). title: DAO 为什么需要更好的去中心化身份工具？
body:
***摘要****：DAO的潜能要得以全部释放，离不开去中心化身份工具。本文写于V神的DeSoc论文发表之前，但关注的同样是web3的匿名性、隐私性和用户真实身份之间的纠缠关系。除阐述去中心化身份工具对DAO组织的重要性之外，作者还介绍了V神早前提到的「灵魂绑定NFT」、人类证明、存在证明、Spruce ID等颇具前景的概念和架构。*

***标签****：#身份验证 #DAO工具 #灵魂绑定*

***题图****：头后戴着盖伊 · 福克斯面具的连帽衫男子*

*作者：[Jan Ole Ernst](https://twitter.com/jan_o_e)｜翻译：Cathy｜校对：[Roy](https://twitter.com/MroyBB)｜排版：[zik](https://twitter.com/ziknonumber)*


---

DAO 由社区驱动，但究竟是谁组成了这些社区？如今，可以使用以太坊地址来代表个人，但这种方法存在缺陷。创建以太坊地址既不用花钱，又可以匿名，这意味着许多以太坊地址通常由同一个人所拥有。

我认为，DAO 的全部潜力能否得以发挥，取决于将链上和链下的身份联系起来的能力。Web3 文化让人回想起互联网的初期，那时匿名论坛是思想的温床，许多人因能匿名发帖而感到自由。

这种自由有利于危险和颠覆性思想的滋生；你不会因为发表了一些荒诞不经、标新立异的想法，而将自己的职业声誉置于危险之中，因此代价很低。

**然而对具有前瞻性、民主透明的 DAO 的治理运作来说，匿名发帖和决策却成了真正的制约。**

DAO 的领域已经变得非常广阔。现在有 Maker 或 Uniswap 等做市协议类 DAO，投资和收藏类 DAO，FWB 等社交类 DAO，Raid Guild 等服务类 DAO，eDAO 等娱乐类 DAO，凡此等等。

![From: https://www.readthegeneralist.com/briefing/dao](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*uiGCrEhq0tbhx9x8uMN7XA.jpeg)

尽管对各个 DAO 运作的贡献可能互不相同，但是去中心化身份工具对任何 DAO 来说都很重要。

做市协议 DAO 的改进很大程度上依赖于外部贡献。如果主要目标是为特定技术任务雇用最好的承包商，那么身份工具似乎就不那么重要了。

然而，在没有身份保障的情况下，匿名贡献者更容易作恶，例如在特定代码片段中建立后门。虽然可以把攻击者的以太坊地址列入黑名单，禁止之后再次贡献，但这并不能阻止其将来使用不同地址来实施类似攻击。

如果对高技能贡献者的识别具有唯一性，他们就更容易建立声誉和可信度。这使得身份工具对服务 DAO 尤其重要。

正如 [SkillWallet](https://skillwallet.id/) 的首创，身份工具应可用于整合贡献者过去的项目信息，并将其与他们的身份相关联。这将让那些具备特殊技能的贡献者与需求方轻易匹配。

对社交 DAO 来说，能让其成员安全可靠地彼此识别的工具是无价之宝。它能够确保成员之间建立起码的信任，反过来又为志同道合的人创造了更好的交流氛围。

投资 DAO，特别是那些提供募资或资助生态系统基础设施的 DAO，需要对治理决策深思熟虑，以确保钱款投给正确的项目或个人。将治理权与具体人员的专业知识、技能和经验挂钩，对于确保参与治理决策的正确人选至关重要。投资 DAO 迫切需要去中心化身份工具，因为他们的治理决策可以深刻地影响整个区块链生态系统的未来。

任何缺乏去中心化身份的 DAO 都很容易遭受[女巫攻击](https://academy.binance.com/en/articles/sybil-attacks-explained)。在女巫攻击中，个人会创建多个地址，并试图通过向网络频繁发送提案，或用不同的地址多次投票来操纵治理框架。这种行为尤其给＂一人一票＂的实施造成困难。未来整个组织、企业甚至政府的决策，都有可能通过与区块链对接，以透明和去中心化的方式进行。为了实现这种未来，我们需要一些工具来防止同一个人使用多个地址作恶。

### 灵魂绑定的 NFT & ENS

在最近的[一篇博文](https://vitalik.ca/general/2022/01/26/soulbound.html)中 Vitalik 提出了＂灵魂绑定 NFT＂的概念。

他的提议范围相当宽泛，但基本假定是，可以在地址内存储一枚特定的＂ID NFT＂，该 NFT 能够表明其持有人的链下身份，因而可以被精确识别。

在付诸实施之前有一些挑战需要克服。

首先，这样的 NFT 如何发行？该构想类似出席证明（POAP），是发给特定活动参加者的唯一 NFT，用以证明他们的出席。然而，即使没有参加某个活动，也可以将钱包交给朋友来领取 POAP。

其次，如何确保灵魂绑定 NFT 的持有者不将其转移？在实践中，包括 POAP 在内的几乎所有 NFT 都是可以转移的。出于安全原因，个人可能会将资产转移到不同的钱包地址。这种灵活性向＂灵魂绑定 NFT＂的概念发出了挑战。因为人们需要通过查阅 NFT 的交易历史，来检查它是否真正识别了特定个人的身份。

一个解决方案是，将灵魂绑定 NFT 再绑定到一个用户不愿意放弃的 ENS （以太坊域名服务）域名上，或者 ENS 本身就可以用作唯一标识。

### Kleros 的人类证明

[Kleros](https://www.proofofhumanity.id/) 开发了＂灵魂绑定 NFT＂的改进版本，名为＂人类证明＂的 ERC-20 注册系统。

在这个注册系统中，一个特定的离线身份被链接到一个以太坊专属地址。＂人类证明＂要求你提交一段视频、一笔押金，以及某个已经注册的人的担保，来确保申请人确实是一个真实的人，并且从未注册过。

因为检举违反规则的申请人能够获得金钱奖励，所以这种激励结构使得已注册成员对查证他人是不是真人怀有强烈兴趣。

在 Kleros 的＂人类证明＂上成功注册地址之后，在现实世界中拥有真实身份与特定技能和经验的人就等于拥有了白名单。

### 存在证明

[Governor DAO](https://governordao.org/) 提出了一种基于生物认证技术的方法，发行唯一且不可转让的 ERC20 个人代币，称为＂存在证明＂。

实现方法是：用户使用 MetaMask 登录到他们提供的入口，然后采集数百个音频和视频数据进行哈希运算。由此创建出代表一个人的唯一加密哈希值，Governor DAO 就得到了与输入地址相对应的哈希值。

通过身份测试的人会获得＂存在证明＂代币，该代币将与他们的钱包永久关联。该代币代表唯一的身份来源。

一名给定用户的感官数据只能生成相同的哈希值，因此将阻止该用户生成另一个附属于不同地址的存在证明代币。这可能是目前最复杂的身份工具。

然而，它需要使用生物认证工具获取用户数据生成唯一的哈希值，从隐私的角度看会引发忧虑。

### Spruce ID — DID

[Spruce ID](https://www.spruceid.com/) 以更宏观的方式解决了身份识别的问题，旨在实现复杂精密的去中心化标识和可验证凭证的框架。

去中心化身份识别的目的，是摆脱存储身份记录的中心化数据库，因为它意味着单点故障的风险。

其核心思想是，要存储的凭证是用户的地址，该地址保存在钱包中并与用户的身份相关联。这个特定的凭证可以由所谓的代理人进行验证。

Spruce 有一个名为 Credible 的钱包和一个名为 DIDKit 的解决方案，提供了跨平台的去中心化身份识别和凭证验证框架。

术语 DID 的含义是去中心化标识，其功能是为特定种类的标识提供数据注册。在实践中 DID 的工作方式相当复杂。协议多种多样，但一般来说包含名域空间规则、加密签名方案和特定的区块链数据模型与算法，如下所示:

![From: https://www.w3.org/TR/did-core/#architecture-overview](https://miro.medium.com/max/1278/0\*1GQ80PYH3UcWuhhP)

使用 DIDKit 可以签署和验证特定类型的凭据，被称为 [W3C 可验证凭据](https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/)。它对应着与凭证主体的识别相关的信息，如照片、姓名或身份证号码。DID 是一种复杂精密的区块链身份识别方法，但由于需要大量的基础设施和服务支持才能得以充分实现，目前还需要进一步的研究和开发。

### 结论

对 DAO 来说，去中心化身份工具是无价的。面对女巫攻击时，我们需要更多的工具来提高韧性和安全性。

DAO 社区需要去中心化身份工具来帮助个人积累凭证、经验和声誉。提高去中心化身份工具的采用率和改善用户体验，都需要更多的投资，我们确实已经有了一些早期的、有前景的备选工具。

我认为，人类证明（PoH）和存在证明（PoE）的实现特别令人兴奋，但还需要付出更多的努力才能广泛采用。我期待看到一些 DAO 能率先将本文提到的一些早期身份验证工具整合到他们的架构中去。

### 参考资料

Buterin, Vitalik. “Soulbound.” *Vitalik Buterin’s Website*, 26 Jan. 2022, <https://vitalik.ca/general/2022/01/26/soulbound.html>.

“Decentralized Identifiers (Dids) v1.0.” *W3C*, <https://www.w3.org/TR/did-core/#architecture-overview>.

James, Stuart. “Proof of Humanity — an Explainer.” *Kleros*, Kleros, 12 Mar. 2021, <https://blog.kleros.io/proof-of-humanity-an-explainer/>.

Mueller, Thomas. “Dao Series Part 2: How to Use Decentralized Identity to Build Trusted Communities.” *Medium*, Medium, 23 Apr. 2022, <https://thmueller.medium.com/decentralized-identity-3-ways-to-build-trust-in-your-dao-4871491903c8>.

“Proof of Existence Documentation.” *Poe Overview — Governor Dao Docs*, Governor DAO, 2022, <https://docs.governordao.org/proof-of-existence-documentation/poe-overview>.

“What Is Decentralized Identity?: Spruce Developer Portal.” *Spruce Developer Portal Blog RSS*, <https://spruceid.dev/docs/primer/>.

实现方法是：用户使用 MetaMask 登录到他们提供的入口，然后采集数百个音频和视频数据进行哈希运算。由此创建出代表一个人的唯一加密哈希值，Governor DAO 就得到了与输入地址相对应的哈希值。

通过身份测试的人会获得＂存在证明＂代币，该代币将与他们的钱包永久关联。该代币代表唯一的身份来源。

一名给定用户的感官数据只能生成相同的哈希值，因此将阻止该用户生成另一个附属于不同地址的存在证明代币。这可能是目前最复杂的身份工具。

然而，它需要使用生物认证工具获取用户数据生成唯一的哈希值，从隐私的角度看会引发忧虑。

### Spruce ID — DID

[Spruce ID](https://www.spruceid.com/) 以更宏观的方式解决了身份识别的问题，旨在实现复杂精密的去中心化标识和可验证凭证的框架。

去中心化身份识别的目的，是摆脱存储身份记录的中心化数据库，因为它意味着单点故障的风险。

其核心思想是，要存储的凭证是用户的地址，该地址保存在钱包中并与用户的身份相关联。这个特定的凭证可以由所谓的代理人进行验证。

Spruce 有一个名为 Credible 的钱包和一个名为 DIDKit 的解决方案，提供了跨平台的去中心化身份识别和凭证验证框架。

术语 DID 的含义是去中心化标识，其功能是为特定种类的标识提供数据注册。在实践中 DID 的工作方式相当复杂。协议多种多样，但一般来说包含名域空间规则、加密签名方案和特定的区块链数据模型与算法，如下所示:

![From: https://www.w3.org/TR/did-core/#architecture-overview](https://miro.medium.com/max/1278/0\*1GQ80PYH3UcWuhhP)

使用 DIDKit 可以签署和验证特定类型的凭据，被称为 [W3C 可验证凭据](https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/)。它对应着与凭证主体的识别相关的信息，如照片、姓名或身份证号码。DID 是一种复杂精密的区块链身份识别方法，但由于需要大量的基础设施和服务支持才能得以充分实现，目前还需要进一步的研究和开发。

### 结论

对 DAO 来说，去中心化身份工具是无价的。面对女巫攻击时，我们需要更多的工具来提高韧性和安全性。

DAO 社区需要去中心化身份工具来帮助个人积累凭证、经验和声誉。提高去中心化身份工具的采用率和改善用户体验，都需要更多的投资，我们确实已经有了一些早期的、有前景的备选工具。

我认为，人类证明（PoH）和存在证明（PoE）的实现特别令人兴奋，但还需要付出更多的努力才能广泛采用。我期待看到一些 DAO 能率先将本文提到的一些早期身份验证工具整合到他们的架构中去。

### 参考资料

title: 为庆祝 Nervos 和 Celer 的合作，我们将举办一场“跨链有奖”活动
body:
近日，继新版 Godwoken 在主网上线之后，Nervos 又迎来了另外一件喜事：Celer 推出的跨链桥 cBridge 已成功实现对 Nervos EVM 兼容 Layer 2 Godwoken 的桥接支持。现在，Nervos 的用户可通过 cBridge 在 Ethereum 和 Nervos Godwoken 之间进行对 USDT、USDC、ETH、WBTC 和 DAI 高速、安全、低成本的跨链转账。后续，cBridge 还将支持更多的资产。

为了庆祝 Nervos Network 和 Celer Network 之间的合作，我们将举办一场“**跨链有奖**”活动，总奖励为等值 $1500 的 CKB，以及精美的 NFT。

## 活动时间

北京时间：2022 年 7 月 13 日上午 10:00 ～ 7 月 20 日上午 10:00

## 活动奖励

在活动时间内，所有使用 Celer cBridge 将 USDT、USDC、ETH、WBTC 或 DAI 从以太坊跨链到 Nervos Godwoken 上，且转账金额超过 $50 的钱包地址，都可以前往 [Project Galaxy 网站](https://galaxy.eco/Celer/campaign/GCsjKUtqZB)领取神秘的盲盒 NFT。

盲盒中一共有 2 款 NFT，其中一款是常规的 NFT，另一款是限量版 NFT。限量版 NFT 总共只有 30 枚，如果你抽到了限量版 NFT，还将获得等值 $50 的 CKB 奖励（按照发放奖励时的价格计算 CKB 数量，或者以未来的某个特定时间点的 CKB 价格为准）。

![常规 NFT（不限量）](https://tva1.sinaimg.cn/large/e6c9d24egy1h452ihubtmj20u20u075z.jpg)

![ 限量版 NFT（共 30 枚）](https://tva1.sinaimg.cn/large/e6c9d24egy1h452iwy077j20u00u0tbd.jpg)

请注意，只有单笔转账金额超过 $50 的地址，或者同一个地址多笔转账累计超过 $50，才有资格领取盲盒 NFT。（如果是多个地址的转账金额累计超过 $50，则不符合领取资格。）

## 奖励发放时间

获奖名单将由 Celer 进行资格审查，Nervos 的 [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nervosnetwork) 也将及时公布相关的获奖信息。奖励将在活动结束后的 14 天内发放。

如果你有任何问题，欢迎加入我们的 [Telegram](https://t.me/NervosNetwork)，我们很乐意提供帮助。

## 关于 Nervos Network

Nervos Network 是一个开源的公链生态和协议集合，旨在解决当今比特币和以太坊等区块链面临的最大挑战。

在 Nervos Network 中，Layer 1 协议字节元 (Common Knowledge Base, 简称 CKB) 是一个开放的、公有的、基于工作量证明的区块链。它旨在通过比特币的安全性、不变性和无需许可的性质存储任何加密资产，同时支持智能合约和 Layer 2 扩展。 与第一代区块链相比，其独特的加密经济模型旨在更好地协调用户、开发者和节点的利益。

获取有关 Nervos 的更多信息，请访问 [www.nervos.org](http://www.nervos.org/)。

## 关于 Celer Network

Celer 是一种区块链互操作性协议，旨在针对资产、DeFi、GameFi、NFT、治理、隐私等跨链解决方案提供一键式用户体验。利用 Celer 跨链消息 SDK，开发者构建的跨链原生 dApp 将具有高效的流动性利用率，连贯的应用逻辑、共享的状态。用户使用 Celer 支持的 dApp，即可在单一链上进行一键式跨链，并从多元化的多链生态系统中受益。

更多信息，欢迎访问：[https://www.celer.network](https://www.celer.network/)

title: Everything EOS周报第二十七期 | 2022年7月11日
body:

欢迎来到 Everything EOS 周报，本期内容汇总了 EOS 生态 7 月 4 日 — 7 月 10 日发生的大事件。

Everything EOS周报涵盖英语、中文和韩语 EOS 社区的消息。我们将持续发布更新来自世界各地的 EOS 生态系统新闻。Everything EOS 周报是了解世界各地 EOS 最新消息的最佳方式。EOS 生态大小新鲜事，一起来看看吧！

> **本周的主要内容包括：**

* Yves撰文谈论GameFi并在纳斯达克发表
* Wombat 发布更新
* Helios 孵化器第4期启动
* EOSIO+联盟工作进展
* Yves接受CryptoCoinShow采访
* 共识架构师系列： 对话EOS网络基金会首席工程师Bucky Kittinger
* Mandel & RC 发布
* 避坑指南+收益策略 | 熊市投资者的自我修养
* 盲猜关键词，连线赢EOS | ENF Discord趣味挑战来袭
* EOS社区活动

## Yves撰文谈论GameFi并在纳斯达克发表

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0\*leC2tiwu0g41YRJ_)

GameFi 是加密领域的下一个[大趋势](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1544454752989323265)，没有任何区块链比 EOS 更适合成为发展 GameFi 和 DAGG 的主场！

我们的首席执行官 [Yves La Rose ](https://eosnetwork.com/about-us/#yves)本周在纳斯达克发表了一篇十分吸引人的[文章](https://www.nasdaq.com/articles/decentralized-autonomous-gaming-guilds-are-essential-to-build-up-gamefi)，文章标题为《去中心化的自治游戏公会对于建立 GameFi 至关重要》。 去中心化自治游戏公会，或称[DAGG](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1520270867275698176)， 是一种新颖的方法，它融合了去中心化自治组织 (DAO) 和游戏公会的双方优势发展而来。 GameFi 是游戏和金融的综合体，游戏玩家以前所未有的方式利用资本进行游戏。

正如 Yves 在[最近的采访](https://youtu.be/8DajaWLwb-Q?t=936)中所说，GameFi 是 DeFi 和 NTF 之间不可避免的碰撞，这导致了去中心化金融的游戏化。 在这篇文章中，Yves 详细介绍了 Play to Earn 游戏的迅速普及、区块链为游戏社区提供的广泛新机会、对DAGG的介绍以及对 DAGG 和 GameFi 令人兴奋的探索，这一切都将有助于增强世界各地的游戏玩家的能力!

[https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1544454756701278211?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1544454756701278211%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fbigbeardsamurai%2Fstatus%2F1544454756701278211image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1544454756701278211?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1544454756701278211%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fbigbeardsamurai%2Fstatus%2F1544454756701278211image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07)

在[纳斯达克发表文章](https://www.nasdaq.com/articles/decentralized-autonomous-gaming-guilds-are-essential-to-build-up-gamefi)的同时，Yves还发起了一项精彩的[推文话题](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1544454752989323265)讨论，简要概述了 GameFi 行业，并预测 GameFi 将吸引数百万人参与。虽然游戏行业传统上以 [付费游戏](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1544454758781669376) 的模式运作，玩家付费，获得没有实际价值的游戏奖励，但区块链技术解锁了新的[游戏即赚钱（P2E）](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1544454762690666496)游戏商业模式，玩家可以获得具有实际价值的加密资产。 流行的 P2E 游戏（如 [Axie Infinity](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1544454772765474816)）使数百万人能够通过玩区块链游戏谋生，而 GameFi 行业正在[呈指数级增长](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1544454772765474816)，最近估值已超过 400 亿美元。

根据 DappRadar 的最新[报告](https://dappradar.com/blog/dappradar-x-bga-games-report-q1-2022)，在 2022 年第一季度，平均每天有 117 万个独立的活跃加密货币钱包与区块链游戏进行交互，GameFi在这期间占所有区块链活动的52%。

随着GameFi的快速发展和区块链技术释放的新机遇，GameFi企业家已经创造了新的游戏机制，如用[奖学金](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1544454778918473728)租赁NFT，为玩家和NFT所有者提供收益。这些新的机会和游戏机制为游戏社区作为[ DAGG ](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1544454787428655104)发挥作用，为进一步增强合作奠定了基础，并且可能很快就会出现让目前GameFi 行业相形见绌的自治游戏公会。

[https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1545406372447195136?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1545406372447195136%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fbigbeardsamurai%2Fstatus%2F1545406372447195136image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1545406372447195136?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1545406372447195136%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fbigbeardsamurai%2Fstatus%2F1545406372447195136image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07)

随着GameFi的巨大增长及我们工具的独特优势，EOS拥有实现这些令人兴奋的可能性的巨大潜力，并为世界各地的数十亿游戏玩家赋能。正如我们 [5 月 9 日的周报](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/blog/everything-eos-weekly-report-may-9th/)所述，大多数流行的 [GameFi dApp ](https://twitter.com/EosNFoundation/status/1545408844398055425)已经基于 EOS 技术构建，[前 5 大区块链游戏](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1521307041054265346?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1521307041054265346%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Feosnetwork.com%2Fblog%2Feverything-eos-weekly-report-may-9th%2F)中有 4 个基于 EOS EVM构建。类似最近与[美国橄榄球运动员协会](https://www.upland.me/nflpa)以及[波尔图足球俱乐部](https://twitter.com/EosNFoundation/status/1542505920432951296)达成合作的[Upland](https://twitter.com/UplandMe)这样非常成功的游戏。

得益于 EOS 的强大功能，[每秒可轻松铸造超过 60 个 NFT](https://twitter.com/MetopianFuture/status/1537453696895680514)，每天可处理超过[ 1 亿笔交易](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1537785002561347584)。还有许多世界级的游戏，如[Blankos](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1539964392187596801)和[liquidiid](https://www.liquiid.io/)，正在开拓EOS游戏技术，为数百万玩家创造惊人的体验，并为下一代游戏建立元宇宙世界。

随着我们的社区不断创新和发布强大的新工具，例如[ Trust EVM](https://eosnetwork.com/blog/introducing-trust-evm-and-the-future-development-path-for-the-eos-evm/)，我们将一起迎接[下一代](https://twitter.com/EosNFoundation/status/1517250263534510080) GameFi，EOS 的优势将很快在 GameFi 行业变得更加明显。 要详细了解 EOS 将如何通过 GameFi 和 DAGG 彻底改变游戏行业，请阅读 Yves 富有洞察力的[新文章](https://www.nasdaq.com/articles/decentralized-autonomous-gaming-guilds-are-essential-to-build-up-gamefi)，并加入我们在[ Discord ](https://discord.gg/eos-network)的社区讨论频道。

[https://twitter.com/EosNFoundation/status/1544466035386064898?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1544466035386064898%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Feosnfoundation%2Fstatus%2F1544466035386064898image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07](https://twitter.com/EosNFoundation/status/1544466035386064898?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1544466035386064898%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Feosnfoundation%2Fstatus%2F1544466035386064898image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07)

## Wombat 发布更新

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0\*A6wVEYIWp9mUZ4Dx)

广受欢迎的EOS钱包和游戏生态系统[Wombat](https://www.wombat.app/)，最近发布了许多激动人心的GameFi功能，并公布了令人印象深刻的[增长统计数据](https://twitter.com/adoptwombat/status/1543920297904160770)!

## EOSIO+联盟工作进展

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0\*6FJZRbnr5vjNfpXA)

过去一周，EOSIO+联盟取得了长足的进步，在为 EOSIO 开发设计更多性能先进、技术效率提升和非常有帮助的功能方面，取得了重点进展！

本周，Yves La Rose 围绕最近 EOSIO+ 联盟会议中出现的令人兴奋的 alpha ，发起了一个富有洞察力的[推文话题](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1544377880674816000)讨论。 联盟的[首要任务](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1544377884940406786)是实现更快的交易最终确定性，最近 [RFP ](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/blog/eosio-coalition-report-may-25th/)的升级使区块确定性从 180 秒提高到[ 1–6 秒](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1544377890124582916)。 这种性能的巨大提升将为 EOSIO 链带来激动人心的新可能性，包括预计在夏末推出的原生 [EOSIO IBC](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1544377890124582916)。

除了原生的 EOSIO IBC 之外，近乎瞬间的终结性也将极大地提升[EOSIO对ETH的IBC](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1544377895337992192)，并使 EOS 能够在不牺牲性能的情况下，[大幅增加](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1544377897196175361)活跃区块生产者的数量。

[https://youtu.be/bB9F47ED1JI](https://youtu.be/bB9F47ED1JI)

得益于如此多优秀团队在EOSIO的基础上进行建设，并有一个用于代码库改进的共享库，联盟的[协同工作方法](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1544377900413198336)正在多个方面实现快速创新，以确保EOSIO成为下一代dApp的最佳软件。

您可以在我们的[ EOSIO 联盟报告](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/blog/category/eosio-coalition-zh/)及[联盟会议](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLRK9ZLYOWiXMZK_151fQLi-7RPsCkj8ge)播放列表中，了解有关 EOSIO 令人兴奋的发展的更多信息。 您还可以从本周的 [EOS 围炉谈话](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zkiC3eg2Ff0&list=PLRK9ZLYOWiXNychJ9fb830HONYVZ_7BlP&index=1)中收听无数令人兴奋的见解，我们的工程总监 [Areg Hayrapetian](https://eosnetwork.com/blog/architects-of-consensus-eos-gets-antifragile-with-areg-hayrapetian/) 和 UX Network 首席工程师 [Gnome ](https://youtu.be/bB9F47ED1JI)之间进行了精彩的深入讨论。

## 共识架构师系列： 对话EOS网络基金会首席工程师Bucky Kittinger

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0\*c_h4fJXBvRTT9QIl)

过去一周，我们的开发者系列访谈节目《共识架构师》，带着对EOS网络基金会首席工程师 Bucky Kittinger 的[精彩深度访谈](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/blog/architects-of-consensus-determinism-at-the-root-level-with-bucky-kittinger/)回归！

《共识架构师》栏目是一个系列访谈，旨在走进高级技术开发者这一群体，他们是致力于开发EOSIO技术堆栈并对其进行迭代的先驱者，也是区块链世界的无畏探索者，通过专注于研究区块链技术的Elliptic Curves和 Merkle Trees，向世人揭示EOSIO的巨大潜力。

## 避坑指南+收益策略 | 熊市投资者的自我修养

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0\*UZwQ5g8XBtqjXo-I)

2022年7月6日20：00，EOS网络基金会中文团队举办了最新一期非正式柚谈活动，本期活动围绕熊市话题展开。

过去两个月，Luna的崩盘、Celsius陷入挤兑危机、三箭资本爆仓…一系列事件形成了多米诺骨牌效应，熊市情绪席卷整个加密市场。面对熊市，很多人都非常关心：这轮熊市到底什么时候会结束呢？普通用户有什么避险的注意事项吗？如何在熊市实现理想收益呢？

本期活动我们非常有幸地邀请到[链上行情分析师比特币子棋](https://twitter.com/BTC521)、[Webx实验室联合创始人Eric](https://twitter.com/ericwebx)、[独立交易员Cherry Panda](https://twitter.com/Cherrypanda6)等行业知名KOL，围绕熊市避坑指南、熊市收益策略等话题展开深度讨论，一起了解熊市投资者的自我修炼指南。

在分享中，[Cherry Panda](https://twitter.com/Cherrypanda6)表示：

> EOS网络基金会做的很多事情都是非常有必要的：比如说EVM兼容，实现EVM兼容也就代表着拥有了吸引资金和用户的基础工具；再比如推出流动性激励计划，这也是为了提升TVL，吸引更多资产进入公链。
>
> 另外，EOS开创了dApp热潮，当时的dApp就相当于现在的GameFi，现在GameFi的玩法当时EOS都有。EOS的基础构建以及性能来说都是够用的，熊市是发展生态的好机会，我也会将精力放在生态内新项目的机会发掘，多做一些投研。

另外，[Webx实验室联合创始人Eric](https://twitter.com/ericwebx)也表示：

> 目前Web3自然用户大概有几千万，Web2的用户有将近50亿，所以将更多的Web2用户引入Web3也十分有必要。当一个杀手级应用出现，吸引新用户也就水到渠成，包括EOS在内，如果出现杀手级应用，对于生态发展十分有益。

## 关于EOS

EOS网络是区块链3.0时代的典范之作，由EOS VM提供支持。EOS VM是一个低延迟、高性能和可扩展的WebAssembly引擎，能够近乎无感的实现确定性交易执行。EOS网络专为Web 3设计，致力于实现最佳的Web 3用户和开发人员体验。EOS是EOSIO协议的旗舰区块链和金融中心，并通过EOS网络基金会（ENF）作为多链协作和发展公共基础产品的工具，进一步完善基础设施，驱动EOS快速发展。

## EOS网络基金会

EOS网络基金会是一个非营利性的组织，旨在倾听社区声音、传达社区意愿并扶持社区优质项目发展，成为EOS社区的信息共享桥梁，并为EOS生态提供资金、技术、运营、未来规划、生态构建等关键基础设施支持，进一步发挥EOS作为世界速度最快的治理型区块链的全部潜力。

title: DAO 为什么需要更好的去中心化身份工具？
body:
*【摘要】DAO的潜能要得以全部释放，离不开去中心化身份工具。本文写于V神的DeSoc论文发表之前，但关注的同样是web3的匿名性、隐私性和用户真实身份之间的纠缠关系。除阐述去中心化身份工具对DAO组织的重要性之外，作者还介绍了V神早前提到的「灵魂绑定NFT」、人类证明、存在证明、Spruce ID等颇具前景的概念和架构。*

*【标签】#身份验证 #DAO工具 #灵魂绑定*

*【题图】头后戴着盖伊 · 福克斯面具的连帽衫男子*

*作者：[Jan Ole Ernst](https://twitter.com/jan_o_e)｜翻译：Cathy｜校对：[Roy](https://twitter.com/MroyBB)｜排版：[zik](https://twitter.com/ziknonumber)*


---

DAO 由社区驱动，但究竟是谁组成了这些社区？如今，可以使用以太坊地址来代表个人，但这种方法存在缺陷。创建以太坊地址既不用花钱，又可以匿名，这意味着许多以太坊地址通常由同一个人所拥有。

我认为，DAO 的全部潜力能否得以发挥，取决于将链上和链下的身份联系起来的能力。Web3 文化让人回想起互联网的初期，那时匿名论坛是思想的温床，许多人因能匿名发帖而感到自由。

这种自由有利于危险和颠覆性思想的滋生；你不会因为发表了一些荒诞不经、标新立异的想法，而将自己的职业声誉置于危险之中，因此代价很低。

然而对具有前瞻性、民主透明的 DAO 的治理运作来说，匿名发帖和决策却成了真正的制约。

DAO 的领域已经变得非常广阔。现在有 Maker 或 Uniswap 等做市协议类 DAO，投资和收藏类 DAO，FWB 等社交类 DAO，Raid Guild 等服务类 DAO，eDAO 等娱乐类 DAO，凡此等等。

![From: https://www.readthegeneralist.com/briefing/dao](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*uiGCrEhq0tbhx9x8uMN7XA.jpeg)

尽管对各个 DAO 运作的贡献可能互不相同，但是去中心化身份工具对任何 DAO 来说都很重要。

做市协议 DAO 的改进很大程度上依赖于外部贡献。如果主要目标是为特定技术任务雇用最好的承包商，那么身份工具似乎就不那么重要了。

然而，在没有身份保障的情况下，匿名贡献者更容易作恶，例如在特定代码片段中建立后门。虽然可以把攻击者的以太坊地址列入黑名单，禁止之后再次贡献，但这并不能阻止其将来使用不同地址来实施类似攻击。

如果对高技能贡献者的识别具有唯一性，他们就更容易建立声誉和可信度。这使得身份工具对服务 DAO 尤其重要。

正如 [SkillWallet](https://skillwallet.id/) 的首创，身份工具应可用于整合贡献者过去的项目信息，并将其与他们的身份相关联。这将让那些具备特殊技能的贡献者与需求方轻易匹配。

对社交 DAO 来说，能让其成员安全可靠地彼此识别的工具是无价之宝。它能够确保成员之间建立起码的信任，反过来又为志同道合的人创造了更好的交流氛围。

投资 DAO，特别是那些提供募资或资助生态系统基础设施的 DAO，需要对治理决策深思熟虑，以确保钱款投给正确的项目或个人。将治理权与具体人员的专业知识、技能和经验挂钩，对于确保参与治理决策的正确人选至关重要。投资 DAO 迫切需要去中心化身份工具，因为他们的治理决策可以深刻地影响整个区块链生态系统的未来。

任何缺乏去中心化身份的 DAO 都很容易遭受[女巫攻击](https://academy.binance.com/en/articles/sybil-attacks-explained)。在女巫攻击中，个人会创建多个地址，并试图通过向网络频繁发送提案，或用不同的地址多次投票来操纵治理框架。这种行为尤其给＂一人一票＂的实施造成困难。未来整个组织、企业甚至政府的决策，都有可能通过与区块链对接，以透明和去中心化的方式进行。为了实现这种未来，我们需要一些工具来防止同一个人使用多个地址作恶。

### 灵魂绑定的 NFT & ENS

在最近的[一篇博文](https://vitalik.ca/general/2022/01/26/soulbound.html)中 Vitalik 提出了＂灵魂绑定 NFT＂的概念。

他的提议范围相当宽泛，但基本假定是，可以在地址内存储一枚特定的＂ID NFT＂，该 NFT 能够表明其持有人的链下身份，因而可以被精确识别。

在付诸实施之前有一些挑战需要克服。

首先，这样的 NFT 如何发行？该构想类似出席证明（POAP），是发给特定活动参加者的唯一 NFT，用以证明他们的出席。然而，即使没有参加某个活动，也可以将钱包交给朋友来领取 POAP。

其次，如何确保灵魂绑定 NFT 的持有者不将其转移？在实践中，包括 POAP 在内的几乎所有 NFT 都是可以转移的。出于安全原因，个人可能会将资产转移到不同的钱包地址。这种灵活性向＂灵魂绑定 NFT＂的概念发出了挑战。因为人们需要通过查阅 NFT 的交易历史，来检查它是否真正识别了特定个人的身份。

一个解决方案是，将灵魂绑定 NFT 再绑定到一个用户不愿意放弃的 ENS （以太坊域名服务）域名上，或者 ENS 本身就可以用作唯一标识。

### Kleros 的人类证明

[Kleros](https://www.proofofhumanity.id/) 开发了＂灵魂绑定 NFT＂的改进版本，名为＂人类证明＂的 ERC-20 注册系统。

在这个注册系统中，一个特定的离线身份被链接到一个以太坊专属地址。＂人类证明＂要求你提交一段视频、一笔押金，以及某个已经注册的人的担保，来确保申请人确实是一个真实的人，并且从未注册过。

因为检举违反规则的申请人能够获得金钱奖励，所以这种激励结构使得已注册成员对查证他人是不是真人怀有强烈兴趣。

在 Kleros 的＂人类证明＂上成功注册地址之后，在现实世界中拥有真实身份与特定技能和经验的人就等于拥有了白名单。

### 存在证明

[Governor DAO](https://governordao.org/) 提出了一种基于生物认证技术的方法，发行唯一且不可转让的 ERC20 个人代币，称为＂存在证明＂。

实现方法是：用户使用 MetaMask 登录到他们提供的入口，然后采集数百个音频和视频数据进行哈希运算。由此创建出代表一个人的唯一加密哈希值，Governor DAO 就得到了与输入地址相对应的哈希值。

通过身份测试的人会获得＂存在证明＂代币，该代币将与他们的钱包永久关联。该代币代表唯一的身份来源。

一名给定用户的感官数据只能生成相同的哈希值，因此将阻止该用户生成另一个附属于不同地址的存在证明代币。这可能是目前最复杂的身份工具。

然而，它需要使用生物认证工具获取用户数据生成唯一的哈希值，从隐私的角度看会引发忧虑。

### Spruce ID — DID

[Spruce ID](https://www.spruceid.com/) 以更宏观的方式解决了身份识别的问题，旨在实现复杂精密的去中心化标识和可验证凭证的框架。

去中心化身份识别的目的，是摆脱存储身份记录的中心化数据库，因为它意味着单点故障的风险。

其核心思想是，要存储的凭证是用户的地址，该地址保存在钱包中并与用户的身份相关联。这个特定的凭证可以由所谓的代理人进行验证。

Spruce 有一个名为 Credible 的钱包和一个名为 DIDKit 的解决方案，提供了跨平台的去中心化身份识别和凭证验证框架。

术语 DID 的含义是去中心化标识，其功能是为特定种类的标识提供数据注册。在实践中 DID 的工作方式相当复杂。协议多种多样，但一般来说包含名域空间规则、加密签名方案和特定的区块链数据模型与算法，如下所示:

![From: https://www.w3.org/TR/did-core/#architecture-overview](https://miro.medium.com/max/1278/0\*1GQ80PYH3UcWuhhP)

使用 DIDKit 可以签署和验证特定类型的凭据，被称为 [W3C 可验证凭据](https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/)。它对应着与凭证主体的识别相关的信息，如照片、姓名或身份证号码。DID 是一种复杂精密的区块链身份识别方法，但由于需要大量的基础设施和服务支持才能得以充分实现，目前还需要进一步的研究和开发。

### 结论

对 DAO 来说，去中心化身份工具是无价的。面对女巫攻击时，我们需要更多的工具来提高韧性和安全性。

DAO 社区需要去中心化身份工具来帮助个人积累凭证、经验和声誉。提高去中心化身份工具的采用率和改善用户体验，都需要更多的投资，我们确实已经有了一些早期的、有前景的备选工具。

我认为，人类证明（PoH）和存在证明（PoE）的实现特别令人兴奋，但还需要付出更多的努力才能广泛采用。我期待看到一些 DAO 能率先将本文提到的一些早期身份验证工具整合到他们的架构中去。

title: 【減醣好食｜雞肉咖哩薑黃花椰菜飯】
body:
## 【減醣好食｜雞肉咖哩薑黃花椰菜飯】

每天攝取適量的醣類，對於脂質氧化、神經功能是非常關鍵的，但吃太多澱粉、含糖食品，熱量也隨之增加，當攝取的熱量超過身體所需要的能量之後，會轉變成脂肪儲存在身體中，此為造成過重或肥胖、演變成心血管疾病的原因之一。因此，我們需要採取適合、健康的減醣行動，但台灣的朋友們習慣每天吃米飯、麵食等澱粉，很難立刻捨棄原本的飲食習慣，怎麼辦呢？

![](https://i.imgur.com/mBMc6bT.png)

第一招是把精製白米飯減半、混搭十穀米、糙米、紫米、地瓜等富含膳食纖維的澱粉；第二招是使用類似飯麵的「替代澱粉食材」，如豆腐飯、花椰菜飯、蒟蒻麵、櫛瓜麵，口感、飽足感和飯麵很像，但含醣量大大減少、同時增加膳食纖維，在減醣最初的陣痛適應期，讓島主不需挨餓、只靠自制力節食。

今天，讓我們來看看含醣量只有白飯 6% 的「花椰菜飯」做法，以及用這個減糖替代澱粉食材製成的代謝好幫手午餐吧！

![](https://i.imgur.com/u3H61iX.png)

📍 每道食譜三大營養素、熱量、膳食纖維的數值為「1 人份」，但食材總和不一定是 1 人份，會標注在食物名稱旁 
 📍 湯匙 = 大匙、茶匙 = 小匙 
 📍 1 杯 = 240 cc 容量、1 碗 = 240 cc 容量、1 量米杯 = 180 cc 容量

***【标签****】#身份验证 #DAO工具 #灵魂绑定*

***【题图****】头后戴着盖伊 · 福克斯面具的连帽衫男子*

DAO 由社区驱动，但究竟是谁组成了这些社区？如今，可以使用以太坊地址来代表个人，但这种方法存在缺陷。创建以太坊地址既不用花钱，又可以匿名，这意味着许多以太坊地址通常由同一个人所拥有。

我认为，DAO 的全部潜力能否得以发挥，取决于将链上和链下的身份联系起来的能力。Web3 文化让人回想起互联网的初期，那时匿名论坛是思想的温床，许多人因能匿名发帖而感到自由。

我认为，人类证明（PoH）和存在证明（PoE）的实现特别令人兴奋，但还需要付出更多的努力才能广泛采用。我期待看到一些 DAO 能率先将本文提到的一些早期身份验证工具整合到他们的架构中去。

title: 为庆祝 Nervos 和 Celer 的合作，我们将举办一场“跨链有奖”活动
body:
近日，继[新版 Godwoken](https://mirror.xyz/0xD58189F5E858A6F67319E33Fa1107eb7e679989f/y3MthWBWGp-L1IHGGDDAbVCHZbSdbZxq2tJFfLfNvMg) 在主网上线之后，Nervos 又迎来了另外一件喜事：[Celer 推出的跨链桥 cBridge 已成功实现对 Nervos EVM 兼容 Layer 2 Godwoken 的桥接支持。](https://mirror.xyz/0xD58189F5E858A6F67319E33Fa1107eb7e679989f/82Te4DtZzJ8n0V1CDTTKaP-sJFD3GBms99NsOSQRcfw)现在，Nervos 的用户可通过 cBridge 在 Ethereum 和 Nervos Godwoken 之间进行对 USDT、USDC、ETH、WBTC 和 DAI 高速、安全、低成本的跨链转账。后续，cBridge 还将支持更多的资产。

为了庆祝 Nervos Network 和 Celer Network 之间的合作，我们将举办一场“**跨链有奖**”活动，总奖励为等值 $1500 的 CKB，以及精美的 NFT。

## 活动时间

北京时间：2022 年 7 月 13 日上午 10:00 ～ 7 月 20 日上午 10:00

## 活动奖励

在活动时间内，所有使用 Celer cBridge 将 USDT、USDC、ETH、WBTC 或 DAI 从以太坊跨链到 Nervos Godwoken 上，且转账金额超过 $50 的钱包地址，都可以前往 [Project Galaxy 网站](https://galaxy.eco/Celer/campaign/GCsjKUtqZB)领取神秘的盲盒 NFT。

盲盒中一共有 2 款 NFT，其中一款是常规的 NFT，另一款是限量版 NFT。限量版 NFT 总共只有 30 枚，如果你抽到了限量版 NFT，还将获得等值 $50 的 CKB 奖励（按照发放奖励时的价格计算 CKB 数量，或者以未来的某个特定时间点的 CKB 价格为准）。

![常规 NFT（不限量）](https://tva1.sinaimg.cn/large/e6c9d24egy1h452ihubtmj20u20u075z.jpg)

![ 限量版 NFT（共 30 枚）](https://tva1.sinaimg.cn/large/e6c9d24egy1h452iwy077j20u00u0tbd.jpg)

请注意，只有单笔转账金额超过 $50 的地址，或者同一个地址多笔转账累计超过 $50，才有资格领取盲盒 NFT。（如果是多个地址的转账金额累计超过 $50，则不符合领取资格。）

## 奖励发放时间

获奖名单将由 Celer 进行资格审查，Nervos 的 [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nervosnetwork) 也将及时公布相关的获奖信息。奖励将在活动结束后的 14 天内发放。

如果你有任何问题，欢迎加入我们的 [Telegram](https://t.me/NervosNetwork)，我们很乐意提供帮助。

## 关于 Nervos Network

Nervos Network 是一个开源的公链生态和协议集合，旨在解决当今比特币和以太坊等区块链面临的最大挑战。

在 Nervos Network 中，Layer 1 协议字节元 (Common Knowledge Base, 简称 CKB) 是一个开放的、公有的、基于工作量证明的区块链。它旨在通过比特币的安全性、不变性和无需许可的性质存储任何加密资产，同时支持智能合约和 Layer 2 扩展。 与第一代区块链相比，其独特的加密经济模型旨在更好地协调用户、开发者和节点的利益。

获取有关 Nervos 的更多信息，请访问 [www.nervos.org](http://www.nervos.org/)。

## 关于 Celer Network

Celer 是一种区块链互操作性协议，旨在针对资产、DeFi、GameFi、NFT、治理、隐私等跨链解决方案提供一键式用户体验。利用 Celer 跨链消息 SDK，开发者构建的跨链原生 dApp 将具有高效的流动性利用率，连贯的应用逻辑、共享的状态。用户使用 Celer 支持的 dApp，即可在单一链上进行一键式跨链，并从多元化的多链生态系统中受益。

更多信息，欢迎访问：[https://www.celer.network](https://www.celer.network/)

title: 3AC’s Bankruptcy Might Signal the Beginning of a New Cycle
body:
On July 2, representatives of Three Arrows Capital (3AC) filed for bankruptcy protection, according to court documents. Voyager Digital announced on July 7 that it had also filed for bankruptcy protection. Facing the unprecedented bear, 3AC became the first giant institutional investor to fall. Apart from the panic caused by the global liquidity crunch, what other factors contributed to the sudden downfall of 3AC?

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/qdnkEsWhmOI2nEGeb5s0E.png?height=640&width=1280)

**Internal Concerns**

Let’s first take a quick look at the internal reasons behind 3AC’s bankruptcy. Simply put, the institution had been playing a high-leverage game via VC investments. In the early days, Zhu Su made the first pot of gold in the DeFi space. As he held a large amount of BTC and ETH, Zhu Su naturally became one of the first-tier venture capitalists when the new bull market kicked off.

Here is roughly how 3AC invested: It borrowed money in the CeFi market and earned arbitrage profits by adding leverage. The hedge fund had deposited its ETH to Ethereum’s PoS Staking for stake mining through Lido, but the ROI was merely 4%. At the time, many platforms launched stETH stake mining, and 3AC saw fit to engage in circular arbitrage, thereby maximizing its returns. Such moves added extremely high leverage to the market, which foreshadowed its bankruptcy.

In addition, 3AC probably used the borrowed money for UST arbitrage. After all, as long as it borrowed funds at a rate lower than the ROI, 3AC could easily profit even if it stayed inactive. However, the UST depeg led to the total collapse of the Terra ecosystem within just a week, and 3AC suffered a 99.9% loss. Following the Terra meltdown, lenders that include Voyager, Celsius, BlockFi, and Babel Finance panicked and started to withdraw their deposits.

![Source: Voyager’s bankruptcy filing](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/EmiCe0V82CahfDAmnakHG.png?height=720&width=751)

It has also been revealed that 3AC misappropriated the funds of 8 Blocks Capital, a client of its OTC trading arm TPS Capital, to add margins. The news immediately created a crisis of confidence, which pushed 3AC further into the pit.

It has been reported that the NFTs of Starry Night, 3AC’s NFT fund, have been transferred to a new wallet for unknown reasons. Creditors, on the other hand, are seeking to freeze 3AC’s assets. They also asked the court to force the company’s founders to disclose all their assets.

As Zhu Su, the founder of 3AC, was accused of not cooperating with liquidators in bankruptcy proceedings, the New York court approved an emergency hearing for 3AC’s creditors, but Zhu Su’s lawyers previously stated that two 3AC executives have disappeared. That said, if liquidators have fully investigated all the assets of 3AC, the market would face another wave of dumping.

**External Challenges**

Apart from these internal concerns, the crypto market as a whole is going through an unprecedented bear. Facing the global liquidity crunch, some countries have even gone bankrupt. As a large swath of traditional financial institutions invest in the crypto market, cryptocurrency has become closely correlated with traditional finance, and thus now faces greater impacts from the liquidity crunch.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dfpky-qdIFdaOPiSOT5D4.png?height=720&width=1080)

Moreover, there are also “time bombs” such as circular lending behind the prosperity of the DeFi market. In addition, many DeFi projects delivered high returns yet only maintained a small reserve, which contributed to their drastic decline during the present bear market.

For 3AC, the bad news was that Ethereum started to merge into PoS when the disaster hit because users cannot withdraw their stETH before the Merge is completed. As such, 3AC could not sell its crypto holdings in time to add margins, which led to more forced liquidation.

**A New Beginning**

We sigh at 3AC’s fall. At its peak, the institution managed assets worth nearly $18 billion. Today, both founders and executives have disappeared, and the company has also filed for bankruptcy protection, which marks the downfall of a crypto giant.

That being said, users care more about the impacts of 3AC’s bankruptcy, rather than the fall of the company. The continuous liquidation of 3AC seems to have punched a hole, from which massive funds fled away. This is undoubtedly a major blow to the crypto market, which is going through a global liquidity crisis.

The crisis has also presented opportunities: After the 3AC crisis, plenty of idle crypto assets were withdrawn withdrew their funds, and those who stayed are mostly big investors fully aware of the risks and confident in the long-term prospect of cryptocurrency. That will come as good news to the market.

Furthermore, after the declines, the leverage risks of cryptocurrency are being mitigated, and the market is also gradually absorbing the relevant impacts, which might signal a new market cycle. As we mentioned in previous articles, some institutional investors have already been pumping money into the market. Though these investors might have different goals, they must agree that the bear market is about to end. A final reminder: Keep track of the flow of capital as it brings prosperity to the market.

在#Binance时，我们欢迎全球一致、支持负责任的创新、保护用户并给予他们选择的法规。 作为一个行业，我们可以通过明智和一致的监管框架建立信任，这将长期扩大这一空间。 在过去的几周里，加密货币政策领域出现了一系列全球活动。 总的来说，关于应该如何监管加密货币的观点仍然存在很大分歧，但我们开始看到更多的全球一致性。 在这个线程中，我将回顾一些最近的发展。 正如我们在半年报告中所发表的： “更多的监管本身并没有什么坏处。适当的监管可以促进更多的机构采用并加强消费者保护，同时允许加密货币得到进一步采用。” TL；线程的博士： 很高兴看到加密货币监管有如此多的变化 币安将继续积极参与这些政策和监管对话 我们力求全球一致、以用户为中心的措施，并将继续推动这些措施， 欧盟的两个重要进展： 1) 就 MiCA 达成协议，这是 27 个国家/地区的第一个全面和定制的加密监管框架。 2) 欧盟公布了旨在防止洗钱、恐怖主义融资和其他犯罪的“旅行规则”。 总体来说，进展不错。我希望像 MiCA 这样的综合框架能够激励其他司法管辖区推进加密法规，这正是我们想要的。一个为 27 个国家提供明确性并可能影响更多国家的框架是朝着全球一致性迈出的良好一步。在美国，我们看到了 3 月白宫 EO 的另外两个结果：财政部发布了其国际加密监管框架。我们分享他们对需要一致的全球监管标准和互操作性以及提升消费者、企业和投资者保护的看法。 此外，美国商务部发布了其关于“数字资产技术竞争力框架”的 RFC 成果。 这两个框架都是在美国司法部 6 月份关于国际执法合作的报告之后提出的。 简介在这里：<https://home.treasury.gov/news/press-releases/jy0854> 令人鼓舞的是，白宫对数字资产监管采取的整体政府方法展开，非常强调一致性和国际合作，以及消费者保护。 在英国，HMRC 发布了关于加密资产贷款征税和 DeFi 质押征税的呼吁。 此举旨在减少适用现行税法的摩擦，并收集投资者、专业人士和组织的意见以进一步制定指导方针。 在与加密货币交互时，税收是用户体验和考虑的重要组成部分，看到政府表现出设计一个有意义的系统并考虑公众舆论的意愿令人耳目一新。 在全球层面，国际证券委员会组织金融科技工作组发布了 2022-23 年加密资产路线图，这是他们未来 1-2 年的监管政策议程和工作计划。 你可以在这里阅读它：<https://iosco.org/library/pubdoc> 作为全球标准制定者，IOSCO 预期的 2023 年政策建议报告可能会影响全球 130 多个国家的政策制定者，尤其是在金融包容性等关键问题被列为首要议程的新兴市场。 接下来，巴塞尔银行监管委员会就加密资产风险敞口的审慎处理发布了公众咨询，详细要求允许银行在其资产负债表上持有有限的加密货币库存。 在这里阅读：[bis.org/bcbs/publ/d533](http://bis.org/bcbs/publ/d533) 根据要求，可能只有少数加密资产符合条件。无论如何，使银行持有加密资产合法化是朝着正确方向迈出的一步。这是进步。自从 Satoshi 于 2008 年发布比特币白皮书以来，银行与加密货币之间的关系一直很激烈。 现实情况是银行在加密生态系统中发挥着关键作用。我们需要他们继续推动采用，这就是为什么我们支持他们越来越多地参与加密货币的开发。FATF 针对虚拟资产 (VA) 和虚拟资产服务提供商 (VASP) 发布了有针对性的实施更新，重点关注旅行规则。 这里有希望的部分是呼吁各国实施一致性。[fatf-gafi.org/publications/f](http://fatf-gafi.org/publications/f) 报告指出，迄今为止，在近 200 个承诺的国家中，只有 29 个实施了该规则。缺乏一致性给币安带来了重大的运营挑战，使得跨境“旅行规则”尽职调查变得更加困难。但是，这一进展对行业、币安和您来说意味着什么？ 从广义上讲，这里的趋势是令人鼓舞的。该行业一直渴望监管清晰，而这些最近的发展表明我们正朝着正确的方向前进。 从财务自由、隐私和金融包容性的角度来看，上述提议看起来比早期版本更好。 这标志着整个行业的良好方向，并展示了加密企业和政策制定者之间的有效合作。与我们的行业同行合作在全球范围内制定一致的实施标准是一个重要的机会。Binance 将继续积极参与即将在全球范围内进行的磋商，以澄清 Web3 生态系统的关键问题，并为塑造监管的未来做出贡献。我们的行业需要我们的声音。

title: Nevermined Raises €3 Million Seed Funding to Make Web3 Development Easier for Creators and Developers
body:
N[evermined AG](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fnevermined.io%2F&esheet=52777978&newsitemid=20220712005503&lan=en-US&anchor=Nevermined+AG&index=1&md5=9d20a735dac1f89fd0799f7548006f6f), a Web3 company that provides tools to read, write and own your digital assets, announced their initial investment round of €3 million, co-led by Signature Ventures and Polymorphic Capital. The Nevermined platform consists of modular solutions that easily allow users the ability to create and monetize digital assets and participate in the read-write-own vision of Web3.

The platform offers the foundations for building digital ecosystems with components like Tokenization Engine, Marketplace Creator, Royalties Engine, Decentralized Access Control, DAO Framework and DISC, or Data In-Situ Computation, for Remote Computation.

Nevermined CEO Don Gossen shares, "The best internet is the one that everyone can access and own. And this is what Nevermined allows people to do. When it comes to Data mixed with Web3 our pedigree speaks for itself - our team has been working with cutting-edge tech for over 20 years, first in Big Data, and now in Web3. With these building blocks, we can help you realize your vision. I'd argue we're the best team in the world that does what we do."

According to a new report by [Grand View Research](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.grandviewresearch.com%2Fpress-release%2Fglobal-blockchain-technology-market%23%3A%7E%3Atext%3DThe%2520global%2520blockchain%2520technology%2520market%2Cdigitalization%2520across%2520the%2520BFSI%2520sector.&esheet=52777978&newsitemid=20220712005503&lan=en-US&anchor=Grand+View+Research&index=2&md5=a80b78fa3b034b2931a9e6cf9318c7ee), the global blockchain technology market size is expected to reach $1,431 billion by 2030. With this market opportunity and its solid, proven technology, Nevermined will leverage this capital raise to:

**Be more complete and scalable by advancing its product roadmap:** Nevermined will enhance its digital asset development platform that makes Web3 accessible by streamlining the creation, monetization and management of decentralized digital assets. Some key projects include:

* Enterprise: A global energy company used the platform to create a peer-to-peer carbon certificate trading marketplace.
* Creative: Autonomies is using Nevermined to build a music NFT platform and DAO, allowing for fairer value distribution between musicians, labels and collectors.
* Science: In a world first, VitaDAO used Nevermined to tokenize the IP of scientific research, conducted by the Scheibye-Knudsen Lab in Copenhagen.

**Be more accessible by accelerating global footprint:**To foster company growth and better customer experience, Nevermined will be strengthening its presence in key areas including product, engineering, marketing and community.

**Be easier to use by expanding the breadth and depth of the partner ecosystem:** Nevermined will establish both technical and creative partnerships that will bolster its mission. Along with deepening partnerships with initiatives such as [Autonomies](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.autonomies.io%2F&esheet=52777978&newsitemid=20220712005503&lan=en-US&anchor=Autonomies&index=3&md5=bbab0661c5be1ccda1d8e34264cf9c83), a music NFT platform allowing artists to become stakeholders.

"We only invest in outstanding teams that build the backbone of the decentralized future,'' said Managing Director Juliane Hahn, Signature. "We see many startups that try to combine Data with Blockchains. Nevermined is the first company that understands the complexities and provides actual solutions at the intersection of Data and Web3. In the future every data-driven company will require the ability to turn their data silos into data ecosystems. Nevermined delivers the full product stack to do just that."

"We've been very impressed with the Nevermined team," said Vitaly Spassky, founder of Polymorphic Capital. "They have the vision, as well as the tech talent and pedigree to execute. To us digital assets are a crucial building block for the decentralized web. And the Nevermined platform makes it super easy for teams and projects to integrate Web3 tech. We're very excited to see what people will build with Nevermined."

Nevermined began as an incubation project within Keyko AG to solve issues around data sharing using tokenization and smart contract gateways. From there it evolved from a data-centric solution to a decentralized digital assets solution with much broader applicability.

**About Nevermined**

Nevermined is a Web3 company that provides tools to read, write and own your digital assets, founded by CEO Don Gossen, CTO Aitor Argomaniz and CIO Dimitri De Jonghe. They met while creating Ocean Protocol, the world's first decentralized data marketplace. In 2019, they founded Keyko over a shared belief in the power of digital ecosystems. They helped a variety of organizations develop Web3 ecosystems, worth a combined value of $3 billion. In 2022, they decided to spin out Nevermined as a standalone technology platform.

More info on [https://nevermined.io/](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fnevermined.io%2F&esheet=52777978&newsitemid=20220712005503&lan=en-US&anchor=https%3A%2F%2Fnevermined.io%2F&index=4&md5=d86b4d6cb2b9b50e0ab8503322ae085d)

**About Signature Ventures**

[Signature Ventures](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.signatureventures.com%2F&esheet=52777978&newsitemid=20220712005503&lan=en-US&anchor=Signature+Ventures&index=5&md5=e838b567c78c44aba50f4a1c66f350af) is an early-stage Venture Capital fund investing in Blockchain, Distributed Ledger Technology and Web3 technology. Based in Germany, the fund invests in Pre-Seed to Series A, globally with a focus on Europe. Signature Ventures is managed by Juliane Hahn, Founding Partner, and Dr. Georg Stricker, Tech Partner. They combine an extensive track record of VC investments with deep Blockchain expertise.

**About Polymorphic Capital**

[Polymorphic Capital](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fpolymorphic.capital%2F&esheet=52777978&newsitemid=20220712005503&lan=en-US&anchor=Polymorphic+Capital&index=6&md5=99176b0e2a9ca633f74d98e8f8bdeec2) is a venture capital firm that invests globally in teams creating the future of the internet with decentralized protocols and digital assets. They specialize in infrastructure, finance and gaming.

title: 门头沟被盗事件进入还款阶段，接下来会发生什么？
body:
​​MT.GOX失窃事件距离现今已有8年时间，2014年MT.GOX宣称受到黑客攻击损失约75万个比特币导致破产，由于缓慢的调查和案件诉讼限制了事件解决速度。经过了重重调查东京法院在2021年11月16日明确MT.GOX还款计划。债权人在2022年7月6日收到MT.GOX“还款登记邮件”，信中显示会从8月底截止，直到还完或部分欠款为止。

 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/KtQ5OIfuO_sycv2_v-DWW.png?height=659&width=566)

 

## ​MT.GOX还款细节及对市场的影响

​

7月6日邮件内容显示债权人可以选择法币.BTC.BCH做为收款方式，选择法币收款可以获得优先登记权。在MT.GOX还款时需要再次验证债权人真实身份。

 

受委托律师Nobauaki Kobayashi准备解锁约14万个比特币进行还款，目前可以庆幸的是MT.GOX没有完全采取赔付加密货币的赔偿方式，减轻了加密市场的抛压。

 

短期来看对比特币的价格会产生一定影响，随着时间推动价格会恢复正常。长期看对行业是利好，MT.GOX从2011年第一次被盗币开始它的乌云一直笼罩着整个行业。每当行情向好时必会冒出MT.GOX的新闻，被资本利用打压价格，造成恐慌抛售。它就像加密行业的达摩克利斯之剑，制约着行业发展，随时可能重创整个生态体系。

 

Brad Mills在2021年11月14日进行了MT.GOX债权人民意调查

Mt.GOX债权人计划保留他们获得赔偿的BTC人群高达54％

​

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Zkarcy-hUtH6_xrGcztMx.png?height=679&width=1035)

 

​MT.GOX债权人计划卖出他们获得赔偿的BCH人群高达68%

​

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/rbn60YCo9Ige0S79DCYBR.png?height=740&width=1035)

 

如果抛售的BTC数量与调查成正比，市场将更轻松抵御抛售压力。不过不用担心，五年前的行业也许会被重创，如今可能只是助推下一次牛市的燃料。

​

## MT.GOX会不会由于某种原因导致还款时间线拉长？

​

信中表明8月底后截至还款登记，没有具体的还款日期与金额，何时可以完成还款计划尚未得知。在东京法院具有法律约束力的监督下，会以较快速度推进事件进展。

 

从链上查得总计68个MT.GOX冷钱包地址，余额总计137890个BTC，137890个BCH，约为30亿美元赔付能力，下图为部分冷钱包地址。

  

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tjz6CNBzPezHfFS5jsyHc.png?height=734&width=574)

 

​30亿美元的赔付能力不是小数目，对于债权人已有至少20倍收益，接下来需等到还款登记表截至日期，随后MT.GOX将发出新公告。希望MT.GOX这场长达十年的演出可以尽快落下帷幕，完美收场。

​

俄罗斯央行发言人对此表示，私人稳定币“具有更高的风险”，因为基础资产池不属于发行人。他们还认为，发行人不能保证按面值赎回，稳定币的价格也不是真正稳定的。该代表指出，卢布仍然是该国唯一合法的支付方式，并表示他们相信数字卢布，因为其结合了数字支付的所有优势和国家货币的可靠性。（Cointelegraph）

title: 认知蝗虫计划【日本加密市场观察】
body:
【输出人】will

【主题】日本加密市场观察

【核心内容简介】

在日本，18-80岁的用户都可以开通加密账户交易，主要集中在coincheck和bitFlyer交易所，但是所有的交易商仅支持代币与法币交易对，比如BTC/JPY，而不支持像BTC/ETH这一类的交易对，而且收益超过200000日元以上需要纳税，条件允许的情况下法人代表也可以开通账户。日本的监管制度完善，加密资产交易商收到行政监管机构和自律监管组织的监管。有意思的是，日本的NFT市场不缺乏创作者，但NFT市场仅有8000名玩家。

【个人思考】

金融危机后，日本国内的经济持续萎靡，恰巧日元的贬值遇上了美元指数的走强，可谓是屋漏偏逢连夜雨。日元的颓势刺激日本国民将储蓄转换成加密资产投资，幸运的是大部分国民参与的NFT项目都获得了超额利润，但是仅仅8000人的NFT市场仍然不建议项目方布局投资。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/5V0-JwD64zVupn-KPKmtV.png?height=1202&width=2544)

介绍：Gnosis safe 基于区块链的资金管理解决方案。 Gnosis Safe 是 Gnosis 开发的多重签名钱包。Gnosis Safe 是在以太坊上运行的智能合约钱包，需要最少数量的人批准交易才能发生（M-of-N）

* 大多数以太坊用户习惯于使用单一密钥钱包，通常称为外部拥有账户（EOA）。这些帐户使用私钥保护，可以将其转换为用户的 12 个单词的“种子短语”。如果该私钥以任何方式泄露，则资金可能会被盗。如果您的企业由超过 1 人组成，则外部拥有的账户不是管理您的加密业务资金的安全方式。如果员工流氓或粗心使用私钥，资金将永远消失。即使您的企业仅由您自己组成，我认为这仍然是管理资金的一种糟糕方式。那么，更好的解决方案是什么？
* 输入多重签名。Gnosis Safe 是在以太坊上运行的智能合约钱包，需要最少数量的人批准交易才能发生（M-of-N）。例如，如果您的业务中有 3 个主要利益相关者，您可以将钱包设置为在发送交易之前需要所有 3 人的批准。这确保了没有任何人可以损害资金。
* 最重要的是，Gnosis Safe 让您对自己的资金进行完全的自我监管。银行不会给您运行加密业务带来麻烦，并且部署的智能合约完全不受信任且由您控制。

## 2/Gnosis Safe 的主要特点

* 安全性：合同经过审计和实战测试。Gnosis Safe 是一个由其签名者密钥控制的多重签名帐户
* 多重签名：用户可以自定义他们的团队管理加密资产的方式，并可选择要求预定义数量的签名来确认交易。比如10个成员一起控制钱包，每笔交易至少需要8个成员签名。
* Apps 支持：用户可以直接在 Gnosis 开发Safe Apps平台上与DeFi 协议进行交互，支持 uniswap、Curve 等应用。
* WalletConnect：Gnosis Safe 支持 WalletConnect，方便用户与 Web3 应用程序交互。
* 多链支持：Gnosis Safe 支持 11 条链，包括 Ethereum、Polygon 和 BSC。
* 对于 DAO 的多签持有者，也将不再是由固定的几位创世成员来维护，一些 DAO 的顶级贡献者也将会希望拿到该权限。Gnosis Safe 能够灵活的添加/删除多签持有者，同时也可以进行多签条件的更改。这一功能在许多多签钱包中尚无法实现
* Gnosis Safe 在进行与外部生态连接之后，使其**不再仅仅是一个钱包，而变成了一个财务机构**。这一改变使其可以更加深入DAO的治理框架中。
* **一定不要盲目，而要非常谨慎**。

更多内容参考官方🔗

[https://help.gnosis-safe.io/en/](https://help.gnosis-safe.io/en/)

## 第二章： Gnosis Safe创建教程

你要知道：Gnosis Safe 由多个所有者组成，为了[创建一个 Gnosis Safe 帐户](https://help.gnosis-safe.io/en/articles/3876461-create-a-safe-multisig)，您需要连接一个签名者钱包作为第一步。Gnosis Safe 帐户地址将与您的签名者钱包的地址不同。

设置一个 Gnosis Safe 帐户只需[60 秒](https://twitter.com/econoar/status/1194731123340763136)。这是入门的 视频教程

1---[首先，在https://gnosis-safe.io/app/](https://gnosis-safe.io/app/)打开 Web 应用程序。

2--点击左上角的“Open App”。单击Create new Safe。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/f2_8IPKeOMNAgQ2lHqIgE.png?height=512&width=3024)

3---连接您的钱包并选择您要使用的链。支持很多链

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/AiE99TuOUEYXBkAVPO8OK.png?height=1128&width=2998)

* 输入钱包名称。选择钱包后，您可以通过单击“创建新保险箱”开始设置保险箱的过程。首先，您需要为您的新保险箱命名。此名称仅本地存储在您的计算机上，绝不会与 Gnosis 或任何第三方共享。
* 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Mf1RWzKaqkMv0GZDELKlJ.png?height=1236&width=2146)

* ### 4--选择签名者

  `这一步很重要，因为这些是有权提交和批准交易的地址（您以后仍然可以删除或替换这些地址）。您已连接的签名者钱包已作为第一个签名者的建议添加，但您也可以更改它。通过粘贴以太坊地址或输入 ENS 名称，添加任意数量的签名者。`
* 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/t6DPsKnVXcGYs9r64Cijq.png?height=1490&width=1666)

* ### 5---定义确认阈值

  最后一步是选择交易或 Gnosis Safe 帐户的任何设置更改需要多少签名者确认才能获得批准。请务必仔细考虑您的设置。如果您无法访问足够多的签名者以达到阈值，您将无法收回您的资产。
* 比如你可以设置3/3，3/5，7/10等。越高越安全
* **个人的常见设置**是具有 3 个所有者（1 个 Metamask，2 个硬件钱包）和阈值 2 的保险箱。Metamask + 一个硬件钱包每天用于签署和执行交易。第二个硬件钱包被锁在一个安全的地方，以防其他两个所有者之一丢失。
* **团体共同管理资金的常见设置**是每个人使用 1 个所有者帐户，然后使用 3 个阈值。因此，没有一个人可以执行交易，所有交易都由另外 2 个人进行双重检查。另一方面，并​​非所有所有者都需要始终确认每笔交易，这对于时间紧迫的交易可能是一个优势。

  如果不同的交易或资产需要不同数量的所有者来确认，我们已经看到组织使用具有不同资产的不同保险箱以及不同的所有者和阈值设置。

  ## 6--查看和部署安全

  查看所有参数后，您可以提交 Gnosis Safe 帐户的创建并按照屏幕上的说明完成帐户创建。 创建完成✅。

7---发送资金，等功能概览

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/K3lBHlzLy8eeoyK6tRqaw.png?height=1378&width=2096)

发送资金会要求每个钱包按照你的阀值执行，最后一个执行的钱包支付链上gas费用。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2g7p6Ppp5drTD91x4p-gJ.png?height=872&width=1818)

### 与合约交互

* 安全钱包支持直接与智能合约交互。您可以点击“New transaction”按钮，选择“Contract interaction”。然后填写合约地址、合约ABI、函数名、函数值。之后的操作与发送令牌相同。很方便！

## 总结

Gnosis Safe 多签钱包是一种去中心化钱包，web3主流资金管理钱包

* 优：通过拥有多个持有者来分散，安全，易于使用，支持多链。
* 缺：不完全去中心化，因为多重签名持有者的数量通常远小于项目的成员数量。多重签名持有者比非多重签名持有者具有优势。

title: California regulator investigating crypto interest accounts
body:
The California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation (DFPI) has warned consumers to “exercise extreme caution” when dealing with interest-bearing crypto-asset accounts.

The DFPI stated that it is investigating multiple crypto interest account providers to determine whether they are “violating laws under the Department’s jurisdiction.”

In a July 12 [note](https://dfpi.ca.gov/2022/07/12/dfpi-is-actively-investigating-multiple-companies-offering-crypto-interest-accounts/), the DFPI emphasized that crypto-interest account providers “are not governed by the same rules and protections as banks and credit unions” and that some platforms are “preventing customers from withdrawing from and transferring between their accounts.”

> “The Department warns California consumers and investors that many crypto-interest account providers may not have adequately disclosed risks customers face when they deposit crypto assets onto these platforms.”

“Consumers are encouraged to exercise extreme caution before responding to any solicitation offering investment or financial services,” the DFPI added.

The DFPI also said that in its view certain crypto-interest account providers have been providing unregistered securities, pointing to two [cease](https://dfpi.ca.gov/wp-content/uploads/sites/337/2022/02/Consent-Order-BlockFi-Lending-LLC.pdf) and [desist](https://dfpi.ca.gov/wp-content/uploads/sites/337/2022/06/D-R-Voyager-Digital-LLC.pdf) orders it recently issued to BlockFi and Voyager to stop their offerings in California.

The warning comes in response to crypto interest account providers such as Celsius Network and Voyager Digital both locking up customer assets over severe liquidity issues amid a crypto bear market.

As it stands, customer funds of both platforms have been locked up for several weeks, with the [fate of their depositors’ holdings is still unclear](https://cointelegraph.com/news/celsius-changes-legal-team-pays-off-20m-in-aave-debts).

Voyager has at least [outlined a potential recovery plan](https://cointelegraph.com/news/voyager-digital-files-for-chapter-11-bankruptcy-proposes-recovery-plan) after post-bankruptcy restructuring, which would allow depositors to receive a combination of Voyager tokens, cryptocurrencies, “common shares in the newly reorganized company,” and funds from any proceedings with 3AC.

However, the company has also tentatively suggested that it may [not be able to make all users whole again](https://cointelegraph.com/news/voyager-can-t-guarantee-all-customers-will-receive-their-crypto-under-proposed-recovery-plan).

***Related: [Investors lament potentially lost ‘millions’ on Voyager bankruptcy](https://cointelegraph.com/news/investors-lament-potentially-lost-millions-on-voyager-bankruptcy)***

In a blog post on Monday, Voyager stated that “the exact numbers will depend on what happens in the restructuring process and the recovery of 3AC assets.”

Depositors weren’t happy, with Twitter user SizzleMcAffy seemingly echoing the DFPI’s concerns about risk disclosures:

> “If I’d known that this platform could freeze my assets without consent, I’d never have opened an account. It’s crazy that you all can use our assets to prop your value up. This kind of behavior is going to severely damage the crypto industry.”

title: Bitcoin to make new all-time-highs within 24 months: Coinshares CSO
body:
Bitcoin ([BTC](https://cointelegraph.com/bitcoin-price)) may have further to fall, but Coinshares chief strategy officer Meltem Demirors believes the top cryptocurrency will reach new all-time highs within the next 24 months.

Speaking on CNBC’s Squawk Box on July 11, Demirors noted that Bitcoin has always been a “cyclical asset” with drawdowns from peak to trough at 80 to 90% historically.

With Bitcoin currently sitting at about 65% down from its all-time highs in November 2021, Demirors believes “there is still room for some downward correction.”

However Demirors noted there has been strong support around $20,000 and that she did not expect Bitcoin to fall below $14,000. She predicted the pain would be a distant memory by 2024, saying:

> “In the next 24 months, we will see new all-time highs in Bitcoin.”

Bitcoin is currently priced at $19,401, down 2% in 24 hours and down 72% from its all-time high.

A reversal may be some time off however, given Demirors can see “no near upside catalysts” — which could signal more pain in store for weaker crypto projects.

“We obviously had a lot of liquidations, a lot of insolvencies that had a massive impact on the market. \[...\] We're talking about $10, $20, $30 billion of capital that has basically evaporated overnight.”

> “\[We\] certainly expect more pain ahead for tech stocks, growth, and also crypto.”

Demiror said she expected a large number of crypto assets to be wiped out during the bear market, similar to what has been seen in tech stocks.

“There's a very long, long tail of crypto assets that I think will go to zero, that doesn't really have any long-term prospect as we've seen with so many tech stocks as well.”

Louis Schoeman, managing director at broker comparison site Forex Suggest, has a similar view and in a recent 9News [report](https://www.9news.com.au/national/bitcoin-price-crash-bound-to-happen-cryptocurrency-analyst-says/fd18e4dd-01fe-42d7-b8b3-54375d8f4305) predicted that the current crypto downturn could kill off as much as 90 percent of all crypto projects.

"This is a cleansing process," Schoeman said, adding that only the strongest crypto projects will survive this bear market.

"But it also serves as a massive opportunity for many no-coiners to enter the crypto market for the first time. Fortune favors the brave in crypto right now."

***Related: [Despite 'worst bear market ever,' Bitcoin has become more resilient, Glassnode analyst says](https://cointelegraph.com/news/despite-worst-bear-market-ever-bitcoin-has-become-more-resilient-glassnode-analyst-says)***

Last month, billionaire entrepreneur Mark Cuban said he doesn’t expect the crypto bear market to be over until there’s a [better focus on applications](https://cointelegraph.com/news/bear-market-will-last-until-crypto-apps-are-actually-useful-mark-cuban) with business-focused utility.

Cuban also believes mergers between different protocols and blockchains will eventually see the crypto industry consolidate, as “that’s what happens in every industry.”

title: US Treasury calls for public comment on digital asset policy, following Biden's executive order
body:
The United State Department of the Treasury has requested comments from the public on the potential opportunities and risks of digital assets in compliance with President Joe Biden’s executive order from March.

In a Tuesday announcement, the U.S. Treasury [said](https://home.treasury.gov/news/press-releases/jy0861) it was asking for input from the public that will “inform its work” in reporting to the president the possible implications of digital assets on the financial markets and payment infrastructures. Biden’s executive order [directed the Treasury Department to take the lead](https://cointelegraph.com/news/biden-signs-executive-order-on-crypto-authorizes-all-government-effort-to-consolidate-regulation) among other government agencies in developing policy recommendations aimed at mitigating both systemic and consumer risks around cryptocurrencies.

“For consumers, digital assets may present potential benefits, such as faster payments, as well as potential risks, including risks related to frauds and scams,” said Nellie Liang, Under Secretary of the Treasury for Domestic Finance. “The Treasury Department is seeking to benefit from the expertise of the American people and market participants by soliciting public comment as we engage in this important work.”

In the request for comment published in the Federal Register on July 8, Treasury noted that the lack of financial education when handling [digital assets](https://cointelegraph.com/bitcoin-for-beginners) could be a factor in rolling out any related policy to vulnerable communities:

“The rise in use of digital assets, and differences across communities, may also present disparate financial risk to less informed market participants or exacerbate inequities. It is critical to ensure that digital assets do not pose undue risks to consumers, investors, or businesses, and to put in place protections as a part of efforts to expand access to safe and affordable financial services experienced by more vulnerable populations.”

The public has until August 8 to submit comments to Treasury on what people believe could be the implications of mass adoption of crypto, both for individual investors and businesses, and the potential impact of introducing new financial products and services. In addition, the government department requested Americans weigh in on potential risks, including [losing private keys](https://cointelegraph.com/news/what-happens-if-you-lose-or-break-your-hardware-crypto-wallet) and the “authenticity of digital assets, including NFTs.”

***Related: [Biden’s executive order promises great things for the crypto industry — Eventually](https://cointelegraph.com/news/biden-s-executive-order-promises-great-things-for-the-crypto-industry-eventually)***

On July 7, Treasury [delivered to President Biden a framework on crypto](https://cointelegraph.com/news/us-treasury-issues-framework-addressing-engagement-on-crypto-with-foreign-regulators) for U.S. government agencies to work with their foreign counterparts, in accordance with the executive order. Liang has [previously called on Congress](https://cointelegraph.com/news/us-treasury-official-beckons-new-stablecoin-regulations) to pass legislation around stablecoins, and [worked to promote financial literacy](https://cointelegraph.com/news/treasury-to-launch-financial-education-initiative-around-crypto-investments) of digital assets among people who have limited access to mainstream financial services.

“For consumers, digital assets may present potential benefits, such as faster payments, as well as potential risks, including risks related to frauds and scams,” said Nellie Liang, Under Secretary of the Treasury for Domestic Finance. “The Treasury Department is seeking to benefit from the expertise of the American people and market participants by soliciting public comment as we engage in this important work.”

In the request for comment published in the Federal Register on July 8, Treasury noted that the lack of financial education when handling [digital assets](https://cointelegraph.com/bitcoin-for-beginners) could be a factor in rolling out any related policy to vulnerable communities:

“The rise in use of digital assets, and differences across communities, may also present disparate financial risk to less informed market participants or exacerbate inequities. It is critical to ensure that digital assets do not pose undue risks to consumers, investors, or businesses, and to put in place protections as a part of efforts to expand access to safe and affordable financial services experienced by more vulnerable populations.”

The public has until August 8 to submit comments to Treasury on what people believe could be the implications of mass adoption of crypto, both for individual investors and businesses, and the potential impact of introducing new financial products and services. In addition, the government department requested Americans weigh in on potential risks, including [losing private keys](https://cointelegraph.com/news/what-happens-if-you-lose-or-break-your-hardware-crypto-wallet) and the “authenticity of digital assets, including NFTs.”

***Related: [Biden’s executive order promises great things for the crypto industry — Eventually](https://cointelegraph.com/news/biden-s-executive-order-promises-great-things-for-the-crypto-industry-eventually)***

On July 7, Treasury [delivered to President Biden a framework on crypto](https://cointelegraph.com/news/us-treasury-issues-framework-addressing-engagement-on-crypto-with-foreign-regulators) for U.S. government agencies to work with their foreign counterparts, in accordance with the executive order. Liang has [previously called on Congress](https://cointelegraph.com/news/us-treasury-official-beckons-new-stablecoin-regulations) to pass legislation around stablecoins, and [worked to promote financial literacy](https://cointelegraph.com/news/treasury-to-launch-financial-education-initiative-around-crypto-investments) of digital assets among people who have limited access to mainstream financial services.

title: US Treasury study finds CBDCs a plus for commercial bank stability
body:
The introduction of a [central bank digital currency](https://cointelegraph.com/cryptocurrency-regulation-for-beginners/what-is-a-cbdc-why-central-banks-want-to-get-into-digital-currencies) (CBDC) may increase the stability of a banking system, according to a paper released Tuesday by the [United States Treasury Office](https://cointelegraph.com/news/us-treasury-calls-for-public-comment-on-digital-asset-policy-following-biden-s-executive-order) of Financial Research. 

This finding counters concerns that a CBDC may encourage runs on weaker banks.

According to the July 12 paper, researchers often claim that the public may in times of financial stress “pull funds out of banks and other financial institutions” meaning that a “CBDC could make runs on financial firms more likely or more severe.”

The authors however argued that a well-designed CBDC can mitigate that risk, and also [offered](https://www.financialresearch.gov/working-papers/files/OFRwp-22-04_central-bank-digital-currency.pdf) two arguments that favored the role of CBDCs in increasing financial stability. 

First, the authors created a mathematical model in which banks performed maturity transformation, that is, they borrowed money for shorter periods than they made loans for, to insure against liquidity risk. This could create financial fragility in case of an adverse event, and that could lead to a bank run.

In the authors’ model, however, access to a CBDC “intuitively” makes “experiencing a liquidity shock” less costly to depositors, so banks can provide less insurance against this risk. Thus, a CBDC leads to greater stability of the financial system.

> “In this way, the adjustments in private financial arrangements in response to a CBDC may tend to stabilize rather than destabilize the financial system.”

The second argument was based on a so-called information effect. Banks in weak positions may try to hide that fact from regulators to avoid intervention. Hiding unfavorable information could also make the crisis worse because of delayed response.

***Related: [BIS: 90% of Central Banks are researching the utility of CBDCs](https://cointelegraph.com/news/bis-90-of-central-banks-are-researching-the-utility-of-cbdcs)***

However, the nature of CBDCs will allow policymakers the ability to identify situations where funds are being converted, and not simply withdrawn from a bank — thus spotting problems sooner which can lead to a faster resolution.

> “By allowing a quicker policy reaction to a crisis, this information effect is another channel through which CBDC may tend to improve rather than worsen financial stability.”

The authors point out that other researchers have suggested imposing caps, fees or other restrictions on CBDC during crises. The authors argue against this approach, noting:

> “Policies that limit the use or attractiveness of CBDC risk losing many of its potential benefits as well.”

They also argue that the benefits of the greater information available to policymakers in the presence of a CBDC may have a variety of beneficial uses.
